body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Jeffrey Hernandez from Sweet Delights Bakery. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Beverly Brown. I have an issue with one of your products.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Beverly. Could you please tell me more about the problem you're experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently bought a box of your cupcakes and found that they were dry and not fresh.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Oh, I'm really surprised to hear that. We strive for the highest quality. Could you provide me with the purchase date?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I bought them two days ago, on the second of October.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Beverly. Could I also get your order number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s five six zero three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for the information. I will look into this matter immediately. We apologize for the inconvenience and will make it right.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jeffrey. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Beverly. Have a great day!
